thrust::system::error_category Class Reference
System Diagnostics

The class error_category serves as a base class for types used to identify the source and encoding of a particular category of error code. Classes may be derived from error_category to support categories of errors in addition to those defined in the C++ International Standard. More...

Detailed Description

The class error_category serves as a base class for types used to identify the source and encoding of a particular category of error code. Classes may be derived from error_category to support categories of errors in addition to those defined in the C++ International Standard.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual thrust::system::error_category::~error_category ( void  ) [inline, virtual]

Destructor does nothing.
